Material_Change_Event.description: A MaterialChangeEvent occurs when an existing material object has been updated in the ERP system.

Notification_Create_Event.description: A NotificationCreateEvent occurs when a new notification object has been created in the ERP system.

Material_Create_Event.description: A MaterialCreateEvent occurs when a new material object has been created in the ERP system.

Business_Partner_Create_Event.description: A BusinessPartnerCreateEvent occurs when a new business partner object has been created in the ERP system.

Chart_Of_Accounts_Create_Event.description: A ChartOfAccountsCreateEvent occurs when a new chart of accounts object has been created in the ERP system.

Sales_Order_Change_Event.description: A SalesOrderChange event occurs when an existing sales order has been updated in the ERP system.

Sales_Order_Create_Event.description: A SalesOrderCreated event occurs when a new sales order has been created in the ERP system.

Chart_Of_Accounts_Change_Event.description: A ChartOfAccountsChangeEvent occurs when an existing chart of accounts object has been updated in the ERP system.

Notification_Change_Event.description: A NotificationChangeEvent occurs when an existing notification object has been updated in the ERP system.

Business_Partner_Change_Event.description: A BusinessPartnerChangeEvent occurs when an existing business partner object has been updated in the ERP system.

info.description:
This is a Java Springboot based CAPM application deployed on CloudFoundry.
It simulates an ERP system which produces create and change events for the following data objects : 
1. Sales Order
2. Business Partner
3. Material Master
4. Chart of Accounts
5. Notifications
info.title: ERP System
